text: The Beyond is a 1981 Italian horror movie directed by Lucio Fulci, and starring Catriona MacColl, David Warbeck, Cinzia Monreale. It is the second of the Fulci's trilogy of "Gates of Hell" trilogy. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies directed by Lucio Fulci
title: The Beyond
